p: The 88 DEGs were input into the STRING database, and the obtained data were imported into Cytoscape to construct PPI network(Fig. 4a) and to find the top 10 hub genes, which were RPS29, RPL9, RPL27, RPS15A, RPS17, RPS27, RPS24, RPL30, RPL34 and RPL35 (Fig. 4b). The expression differences of these 10 hub genes in the VTE group and the normal control group are shown in Fig. 4c.
